Body:
vgp0, vgp1, cvgp = _prepare_models()
mu1, var1 = vgp0.predict_y(Datum.Xtest)
c_mu1, c_var1 = cvgp.predict_y(np.hstack([Datum.Xtest, np.zeros((Datum.
    Xtest.shape[0], 1))]))
assert_allclose(mu1, c_mu1[:, :1], atol=0.0001)
assert_allclose(var1, c_var1[:, :1], atol=0.0001)
mu2, var2 = vgp1.predict_y(Datum.Xtest)
c_mu2, c_var2 = cvgp.predict_y(np.hstack([Datum.Xtest, np.ones((Datum.Xtest
    .shape[0], 1))]))
assert_allclose(mu2, c_mu2[:, 1:2], atol=0.0001)
assert_allclose(var2, c_var2[:, 1:2], atol=0.0001)
